analysis.description:
CrowdsaleWPTByRounds.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0xe2ca8e9eea579da2276be4267320fd9069645431.sol#439-460) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-minterContract.mint(_beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/12/0xe2ca8e9eea579da2276be4267320fd9069645431.sol#455-458)

CrowdsaleWPTByRounds.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/12/0xe2ca8e9eea579da2276be4267320fd9069645431.sol#404-409) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/12/0xe2ca8e9eea579da2276be4267320fd9069645431.sol#408-409)

CrowdsaleWPTByRounds.hasOpened (/unique_chucks/12/0xe2ca8e9eea579da2276be4267320fd9069645431.sol#415-423) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (openingTime < block.timestamp && block.timestamp < closingTime) (/unique_chucks/12/0xe2ca8e9eea579da2276be4267320fd9069645431.sol#421-423)
